titleStmt.title: A commentary upon the divine Revelation of the apostle and evangelist, Iohn by David Pareus ... ; and specially some things upon the 20th chapter are observed by the same authour against the Millenaries ; translated out of the Latine into English, by Elias Arnold.
titleStmt.author: Pareus, David, 1548-1622.
Arnold, Elias.

notesStmt.note: Translation of an undetermined work in Latin.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
